name: stock-analysis-platform
description: Unified Stock Analysis Platform with Web, Mobile, and Backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:web && npm run install:mobile
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:web" "npm run start:mobile"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:web && npm run test:mobile
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.type-check:all: npm run type-check:web && npm run type-check:mobile
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules web/node_modules mobile/node_modules backend/__pycache__ backend/.pytest_cache

author: Stock Analysis Platform
